package.name: HTML_QuickForm_SelectFilter
package.summary: Element for PEAR::HTML_QuickForm that defines dynamic filters for select elements.
package.description: The PEAR::HTML_QuickForm_SelectFilter package adds an element to the PEAR::HTML_QuickForm package that is used to define dynamic filters for select elements.

release.notes: This is the initial release of the HTML_QuickForm_SelectFilter package.
This is the initial release of the HTML_QuickForm_SelectFilter package.
